text: Faith Hill performing at the American Airlines Center for the Soul2Soul II Tour, July 22, 2006 Since its opening in 2001, the American Airlines Center in Dallas, Texas has hosted many local, regional and international artists, spanning a wide range of musical genres. A list of notable concerts are given in the table below, arranged in a chronological order. The first concert at the American Airlines Center, which was also the arena's first event, was by the Eagles on July 28, 2001, about a week after it opened. With ten performances, the Eagles have performed more times than any other artist at the arena, producing the highest concert grosses for the venue with over 125,000 tickets sold. ==2000s== ;2001 {| class="wikitable collapsible collapsed" style="text-align:center;" |- ! colspan="7"| Concerts at the American Airlines Center |- !
